me.zirko

Class ExpressionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.zirko.ExpressionBuilder

  • public class ExpressionBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    ExpressionBuilder is a simple math expression API that interface with your CalculatorPanel It handles Int and Double for simple operation and scientific functions like sin(Double), or cos(Double) Here is an example of use which do "( 5 + 10 ) / 5" 
         ExpressionBuilder expBuilder = new ExpressionBuilder(myView);
     expBuilder.build("add", 5);
     expBuilder.build("divide", 10);
     myRes = expBuilder.build("equal", 5);
     System.out.println(myRes); // Will print 3
    Since:
    1.0
